articles.title: SAN JOSE AMATEUR ASTRONOMERS MONTHLY BULLETIN JULY 1972
articles.summary: The 'SAN JOSE AMATEUR ASTRONOMERS MONTHLY BULLETIN' for July 1972 introduces the organization and lists its elected officers. David Erickson serves as President, Tom Halliday as Vice-President, Jerry Rattley as Secretary, and Emmet Murphy as Treasurer.

articles.title: BOARD OF DIRECTORS:
articles.summary: The document lists the Board of Directors for the San Jose Amateur Astronomers, including their service terms, and indicates that officers for the upcoming year are among them. It also announces the club's Annual Banquet and Installation of Officers, scheduled for July 16, 1972, at the Red Carpet Restaurant. The event includes a five-course dinner for $6.25 per person, with reservations due by July 10, 1972.

articles.title: PLANNING MEETING
articles.summary: A planning meeting is scheduled to take place at Dave Aguilar's home, located at 4677 Scotts Valley Dr., Scotts Valley. The meeting is set to begin at 8 p.m., and a phone number (438-0428) is provided for attendees.

articles.title: STARPARTY
articles.summary: A starparty is scheduled for July 8 at the Skyline site. The location is precisely described as 1.8 miles past Skyline Blvd. (towards Felton) on Hwy 9, with the clearing situated on the left.

articles.title: FOR SALE
articles.summary: This document is a 'for sale' advertisement for a 12Â½ inch f/4.1 reflector telescope. The telescope comes with a Deluxe Starliner Mount, various finders (Unitron 60 mm and 50 mm wide-angle), and miscellaneous accessories, all in mint condition. It is priced at $750.00, with contact information provided for R. W. Schaupp in Cupertino, California.
